item.title: 2021.08.25 patch notes (v110.01) | TERA KR
item.description: Update 1. Dungeon Resonance (pl.) Dungeon Resonance (pl.) phenomenon has occurred in Balderon (pl.) Resonated dungeons can only be entered through the Resonance Gate (pl.) located in Balderon (pl.), Baldera (pl.) Dungeon Resonance (pl.) content becomes available after completing ‘[중요] 던전 공명 현상 탐구’ quest available at level 70 Two types of gates exist : Resonance Gate (pl.
